articles.author: Marta Jary
articles.title: Olivia Newton-John's daughter Chloe Lattanzi shares heartbreaking tribute - Daily Mail
articles.description: Chloe Lattanzi has shared a moving tribute to her late mother Olivia Newton-John.
articles.content:
Chloe Lattanzi has shared a moving tribute to her late mother Olivia Newton-John. 
In an Instagram post on Sunday, the 37-year-old actress and singer shared an image of her hand in front of a number… [+2984 chars]
